```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


## Data Import: CSVs

Lets import data using the `reader` package

```{r}
litters_df = read_csv("data/FAS_litters.csv")
litters_df = janitor::clean_names(litters_df)
```

```{r}
litters_df

head(litters_df)
tail(litters_df)

```

```{r, eval = FALSE}
View(litters_df)
```

```{r}
skimr::skim(litters_df)

```

`read_csv` iotions ..

```{r, eval = FALSE}
read_csv("data/FAS_litters.csv", na = c("", "NA", 999, 88), skip = 2)
```


## Data import - other formats

We need to read in an excel spreadsheet ...

```{r}
library(readxl)
```


```{r}
mlb_df = read_excel("data/mlb11.xlsx")
```

```{r, eval = FALSE}
view(mlb_df)
```

```{r}
lotr_words_df = read_excel(
  "data/LotR_Words.xlsx",
  range = "B3:D6"
)

lotr_words_df
```


## Still more formats ...

Read in a SAS dataset.



```{r}

pulse_df
```
